summary: The diff adds Internet Identity sign-in/out controls to the HUD and removes emoji from the title text, but it does not clearly include a "Signed in" indicator label alongside the principal as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: The HUD shows a basic signed-in indicator (e.g., "Signed in" and the principal string or a shortened principal) when authenticated.
missing_requirements.reason: When authenticated, the HUD displays only the (shortened) principal inside a badge, without an explicit signed-in indicator label such as "Signed in".
